usage.description: A 60-card mystery expansion with genre-focused cards across all 5 card types
integration: Use only expansion cards - Provides genre-focused prompts, but you will cycle through the same cards more often
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - The main deck works with all genres, so the added cards will increase the genre focus
Freely mix multiple expansions and boosters - Blending genres is a rewarding (and challenging) way to create prompts
notes: You may wish to temporarily remove cards from the main deck to increase the proportion of expansion cards and create more genre-focused prompts
